2519.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|99|96$رَءَاكَ|you see|75|103|11785$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|117|20$كَفَرُوٓاْ|disbelieve|84|112|59$إِن|not|44|72|225$يَتَّخِذُونَكَ|they take you|113|141|11786$إِلَّا|except|65|79|86$هُزُوًا|(in) ridicule,|99|105|659$أَهَـٰذَا|"Is this|66|78|11787$ٱلَّذِى|the one who|103|115|138$يَذْكُرُ|mentions|79|91|11261$ءَالِهَتَكُمْ|your gods?"|97|109|11788$وَهُم|And they|80|92|256$بِذِكْرِ|at (the) mention|130|136|9448$ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ|(of) the Most Gracious|170|246|3$هُمْ|[they]|62|214|49$كَـٰفِرُونَ|(are) disbelievers.|139|215|6416$

2520.verse: خُلِقَ|Is created|88|99|11789$ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ|the man|90|112|3927$مِنْ|of|50|72|53$عَجَلٍ‌ۚ|haste.|70|92|11790$سَأُوْرِيكُمْ|I will show you|118|140|6829$ءَايَـٰتِى|My Signs|82|104|6043$فَلَا|so (do) not|95|106|208$تَسْتَعْجِلُونِ|ask Me to hasten.|140|140|11791$

2524.verse: وَلَقَدِ|And verily,|90|101|1192$ٱسْتُهْزِئَ|were mocked|107|129|5445$بِرُسُلٍ|Messengers|97|119|5446$مِّن قَبْلِكَ|before you|102|124|47$فَحَاقَ|then surrounded|128|150|5447$بِٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|100|3498$سَخِرُواْ|mocked|91|109|5448$مِنْهُم|from them|87|124|730$مَّا|what|53|90|262$كَانُواْ|they used|86|123|94$بِهِۦ|at it|52|89|204$يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ|(to) mock.|123|141|5420$

2527.verse: بَلْ|Nay,|50|57|848$مَتَّعْنَا|We gave provision|141|155|9849$هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ|(to) these|88|102|335$وَءَابَآءَهُمْ|and their fathers|131|145|11800$حَتَّىٰ|until|64|78|526$طَالَ|grew long|84|98|11801$عَلَيْهِمُ|for them,|81|88|602$ٱلْعُمُرُ‌ۗ|the life.|76|84|11802$أَفَلَا|Then do not|101|118|452$يَرَوْنَ|they see|78|95|1441$أَنَّا|that We|74|91|4147$نَأْتِى|We come|81|98|9500$ٱلْأَرْضَ|(to) the land,|110|127|197$نَنقُصُهَا|We reduce it|105|113|9501$مِنْ|from|50|87|53$أَطْرَافِهَآ‌ۚ|its borders?|98|172|9502$أَفَهُمُ|So is (it) they|113|187|11803$ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ|(who will be) overcoming?|192|229|5074$

2519.verse: And when those who disbelieve see you, [O Muhammad], they take you not except in ridicule, [saying], "Is this the one who insults your gods?" And they are, at the mention of the Most Merciful, disbelievers.

2520.verse: Man was created of haste. I will show you My signs, so do not impatiently urge Me.

2521.verse: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"

2522.verse: If those who disbelieved but knew the time when they will not avert the Fire from their faces or from their backs and they will not be aided...

2523.verse: Rather, it will come to them unexpectedly and bewilder them, and they will not be able to repel it, nor will they be reprieved.

2524.verse: And already were messengers ridiculed before you, but those who mocked them were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.

2525.verse: Say, "Who can protect you at night or by day from the Most Merciful?" But they are, from the remembrance of their Lord, turning away.

2526.verse: Or do they have gods to defend them other than Us? They are unable [even] to help themselves, nor can they be protected from Us.

2527.verse: But, [on the contrary], We have provided good things for these [disbelievers] and their fathers until life was prolonged for them. Then do they not see that We set upon the land, reducing it from its borders? So it is they who will overcome?
